#summary Extended default JavaScript Array object API
#labels API

=Class Array=
*Package:*<br/>
*File:* [http://code.google.com/p/jsool/source/browse/trunk/jsool/js/core/Array.js Array.js]<br/>
*Extends:* Object<br/>
----
The Array object is used to store multiple values in a single variable.
===Static Methods===
|| *Name* || *Parameters* || * Description * ||
||isArray||Object object||Checks if _object_ is an Array||

===Public Methods===
|| *Name* || *Parameters* || *Description* ||
||shuffle||_void_||Shuffles the current array elements||
||forEach||Function action||Runs _action_ for each element on the array||
||every||Function action||Returns `true` if _action_ returns true for every element on array||
||filter||Function action||Returns a new array with the elements that returns `true` for _action_||
||map||Function action||Returns a new array with the result of _action_ for each element on the array||
||indexOf||Object element||Retuns the index of the _element_ on the array||
||concat||Array... arrays||Retuns the result of the concatenation of the arrays||
||sum||_void_||Retuns the result of the sum of all elements on the arrays||
||accumulates||Function action||Returns the sum of the results of _action_ for each element on the array||
